segments.text: I do feel like a trip to Florida on such a gloomy day in New York , to enjoy the sunshine while lying on the beaches of Florida .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's a great idea . It's the best season for tourists in Florida . You can also get a good sun-tan there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But if the sunshine is too strong , it might damage the eyes and the skin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You can put on your shades . And remember don't make your skin look like a tomato . Or else after that your skin will begin to flake off . You may even wind up with skin cancer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Overdoing it will do more harm than good .
segments.speaker: S1
